title: Vestrics Releases New Measurement Map Atlas Product
text:
Vestrics, the leading predictive analytics and workforce optimization solutions provider, releases new Measurement Map Atlas Product
Chapel Hill, NC
Vestrics, the leading predictive analytics and workforce optimization solutions provider, today announced the release of the Measurement Map Atlas. The Measurement Map Atlas will be available to the market immediately.
The Measurement Map Atlas is an advanced collection of Measurement Maps, which are visual depictions of the alignment between Human Capital investments and programs to strategic business goals. The Measurement Map communicates complex information in a single image that is easily understood by all business stakeholders and is instrumental in guiding teams through their analytical endeavors. Example maps from the Atlas include topics such as: Collaboration Portal, Supervisor Development, Call Center, Strategic Selling, Loan Officer Evaluation, and Retail Store Performance.
“The Measurement Map Atlas is a culmination of over 10 years of consulting work in conducting business impact studies for Fortune 500 organizations. Vestrics works every day with clients in need of Measurement Maps, but not quite knowing where to start. The Atlas provides a framework in crafting program specific maps, but allows the user to fully customize based on their organization’s needs. For example, a retail organization can assess the improved productivity and revenue of implementing self-checkout terminals. This is the perfect support tool to our already popular predictive analytics and workforce optimization platform – Vision,” states Brian J. Kelly, President & CEO of Vestrics.
ABOUT VESTRICS
Vestrics helps organizations across the globe measure, predict and optimize the business impact of human capital decisions through Vestrics’ Vision, the leading cloud-based predictive analytics and workforce optimization platform. Founded in 2004, as Capital Analytics, Vestrics has been recognized by Aragon Research as a 2015 Hot Vendor, by Gartner as a Cool Vendor of the Year, by the ROI Institute for the most innovative approach to ROI and by Bersin and Associates as a learning leader. The Brandon Hall Group recently awarded Vestrics with an Excellence in Technology recognition and CIOReview Magazine named Vestrics to the top most promising companies for data analytics. For more information about Vestrics and the Vision platform, please visit http://www.vestrics.com .
